mapper.sql: ROLE_ID, ROLE_NAME, ROLE_TYPE, ROLE_DESC, ROLE_DEPT, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_BY, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_BY
mapper.select:
select
from DY_ROLE order by to_number(ROLE_TYPE) asc nulls last, ROLE_NAME asc

select
from (select distinct r.* from dy_role r left join dy_user_role ur on ur.role_id = r.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) order by to_number(ROLE_TYPE) asc nulls last, ROLE_NAME asc
mapper.insert:
select sys_guid() from dual
